trigger.expression: ({Custom - OS - Puppet:proc.num[,root,,.*ruby.*puppet agent.*$].last()}<1) or ({Custom - OS - Puppet:proc.num[,root,,.*ruby.*puppet agent.*$].nodata(3700)}=1)
trigger.name: Puppet Agent Process not active for one hour
trigger.description: Trigger if Puppet Agent Process is not running or has no data for 1h

trigger.name: Puppet Run older than one hour
